name: Generic RPG Idle - Sound of Art
name_original: Generic RPG Idle - Sound of Art
description:
An idle RPG where your loot matters. Optimize your equipment, defeat mighty foes, perform dark rituals and enjoy a medieval tale of revenge in a twisted version of Brazil. Elite enemies challenge how optimized your build is while random-free combat ensures attacks never miss.

The game can be controlled with the mouse, mainly by clicking on buttons.

Keyboard

WASD - move cursor

L - Level Up 

N - Nap / Wake up

Q/E - move between tabs

Z/X - move between areas
